Text:
Years 2009, 2010, & 2011 are each around 450GB, way too much for my bandwidth to allow. 

I'll continue to upload randomly, or would consider requests.
use FastStone Photo Resizer to resize it. You can save 70-75% space
Thanks, that would be a way to go,  but I'm determined I'mma uploading these at the highest resolution possible, and in a form usable by all.
try to load small size (1920X1280) version too with high resolution. It will give low bandwidth users a choice to download.

Looking for ALL the Chantelle A. Shoots.

Would be appreciated.
